titleStmt.title: By the King. An abstract of the seuerall heads and branches, for which His Maiesties commissioners, by vertue of His Maiesties commission of grace, bearing date the three and twentieth day of Ianuary last past, haue power to compound with such as shall desire the same.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Steele notation: Tithes His 2) vnto Com-.
Issued with the proclamation of 27 May 1630.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
